```suggestion
  let _ := TopologicalAddGroup.toUniformSpace F
  have := comm_topologicalAddGroup_is_uniform (G := F)
```
Are `letI` and `haveI` still useful in Lean 4?
They are useful, if you want to inline your `let`.
